item.title: Delta]how do i make ranged weapons hit higher?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

To include the bonus of the weapons, use playerBonus[5] (in 317s, I don’t know the name of the array, but it is 5)

item.title: Delta]how do i make ranged weapons hit higher?
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

s3x 4 u l1f3:

change bonuses in items.cfg

That will don’t do anything, all it does is highers the chance of a player hitting through a def noob.

search for

public int maxRangeHit()

scroll down, and u’ll see something like this:

public int maxRangeHit() { double d = ???D; double d1 = playerLevel[playerRanged]; d += ????? + d1 *?????; d += d1 * ???; client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; if (AttackingOn2 != null) { if(hasCrystalBow()) { d *= ?D; } else if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 883)) { d *= ?D; } else if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 885)) { d *= ?D; } else if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 887)) { d *= ?D; } else if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 889)) { d *= ?D;
and the d *= ?
is damage change that number.
